text: Israelia akɨrim God gasarazɨma, God bizir aghuir avɨriba nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamizibar akura. Israelia Godɨn arazimɨn irezɨ, God akurvazir ekiam Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibagh anɨngi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gɨn Israelian God mɨseveziba bar God bagh ua izeghtɨ, God guizbangɨra bizir bar aghuir avɨribar gumazamizibar amuam.
